Ragnar stopped just meters from the pod. He looked in all directions 
to try to catch something on his sensors. As he did, he opened a 
commline with the base.

Ragnar: Maximal base, this is Bear Alpha. I have arrived at the 
designated location. Visual and Infrared scanners indicate no threat, 
but magres shows two metallic object moving slightly and seemingly 
humanoid. I await orders. Bear Alpha out.

out
